com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib

Class DebugLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib.DebugLevel

  • public class DebugLevel
extends Object
    Class checking debug level This class will get the current Debug level from SharedPreferences. And checks if the current level matches the required level
    Author:
    Dieter Adriaenssens

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEBUG_LEVEL_HIGH
      Debug level : high (show all debug messages).
      static int DEBUG_LEVEL_LOW
      Debug level : low (show limited debug messages).
      static int DEBUG_LEVEL_MEDIUM
      Debug level : medium (show some debug messages).
      static int DEBUG_LEVEL_OFF
      Debug level : off.
      static String PREF_DEBUG_LEVEL
      Name of Debug Level in Shared Preferences.

      Constructor.
